articles.title: Micron raises forecasts as AI boosts memory chip demand
articles.summary: Micron Technology on Monday raised its forecast for fourth-quarter revenue and adjusted profit, due to surging demand for its memory chips used in artificial intelligence infrastructure, sending its shares around 5% higher before the bell.

articles.title: Micron Technology raises quarterly results forecast on AI-driven demand
articles.summary: Micron Technology on Monday raised its forecast for fourth-quarter revenue and adjusted profit, due to surging demand for its memory chips used in artificial intelligence infrastructure, sending its shares up 5% before the bell.

articles.title: Indonesia eyes 'sovereign AI fund' to drive development, document shows
articles.summary: Authorities overseeing the development of artificial intelligence in Indonesia have proposed a "sovereign AI fund" to finance the archipelago's ambitions to become a regional hub for the fast-growing technology, a government document showed.
articles.translated_title: Indonesia eyes 'sovereign AI fund' to drive development, document shows

articles.title: Workers are seeking out AI training to prepare for the jobs of tomorrow
articles.summary: Working professionals and young people are investing in artificial intelligence courses, programs and degrees as the technology promises to transform jobs.

articles.title: Exclusive: SK Hynix expects AI memory market to grow 30% a year to 2030
articles.summary: South Korea's SK Hynix forecasts that the market for a specialized form of memory chip designed for artificial intelligence will grow 30% a year until 2030, a senior executive said in an interview with Reuters.

articles.title: CNBC Daily Open: The U.S. government gets a slice of the AI pie
articles.summary: U.S. stocks have received a strong boost from the artificial intelligence boom, ending the week on a high note.

articles.title: How This AI Breakthrough with Pure Mathematics and Reinforcement Learning Could Help Predict Future Crises
articles.summary: An artificial intelligence breakthrough uses reinforcement learning to tackle the Andrews-Curtis conjecture, solving long-standing counterexamples and hinting at tools for forecasting stock crashes, diseases and climate disasters

articles.title: Meta And Microsoft Are Betting Big On AI - So Is The C-Suite
articles.summary: Like Meta and Microsoft, CxOs are fast-tracking artificial intelligence not as a future play, but as a present-day growth lever.
